title: Hotel Reservation App
description: A Hotel Reservation App that uncludes features that allow the user to view hotel rooms based on specific criteria, book rooms, check out, and edit/review bookings. This application was created over the course of a semester with a team of four of us who ahd little to no Java Servlets experience. It was a great experience to get familiar with the workings of Java and working with others to see a project through to deployment.

title: CLI Shell Simulator
description: A program that mimics a basic Linux shell supporting things such as pipes, input and output redirection, along with commands like 'cat', 'cd', 'pwd', 'mkdir', and 'ls'. For a full list of commands and functionality please check the github. I learned a lot about using Linux and C++ system commands through this project. This was a semester long project that was done in four major pieces.

title: LRU Cache Simulator
description: This is a program that simulates cache memory that uses the Least Recently Used Policy which replaces least recently used memory blocks to make room for incoming data. This project taught me a lot about the workings of cache memory and working with memory addresses.
